name: moonblast
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s offensive stats.
